body_html:
I can reproduce the assertion error with TF 1.4.0 CPU. When setting fused=False the assertion disappears. TF 1.3.0 has fused=False as default.

This is sort of an expected behavior that fused operations will have slightly different precision.
body_text:
I can reproduce the assertion error with TF 1.4.0 CPU. When setting fused=False the assertion disappears. TF 1.3.0 has fused=False as default.
This is sort of an expected behavior that fused operations will have slightly different precision.
body:
I can reproduce the assertion error with TF 1.4.0 CPU. When setting `fused=False` the assertion disappears. TF 1.3.0 has `fused=False` as default.

This is sort of an expected behavior that fused operations will have slightly different precision.
